comment: I only think that INNOVA is fun because of how expressive the lecturer is and just give us a lot of reality stuff. The only thing I find it bored or I hate is the project guideline which frustrate me the most because it’s a joint project  with another core module which both modules have a separate guidelines 🙄. Wish the guidelines be standardized omg
